channel.title: How do i increase the HP and damage of an NPC?
channel.description:
how do i increase the HP and damage of an NPC?
and also im trying to add herbs as some NPC drops but when i add them it gives me an error and it says something about NPC dropHandler, while all the other drops i added worked out fine

item.title: How do i increase the HP and damage of an NPC?

npc drops to add drops and thx

item.title: How do i increase the HP and damage of an NPC?
item.dc:creator: @adog17x adog17x
item.description:
@adog17x wrote:

How’d you add the drops, in npcdrops.cfg or npchandler?

To increase the HP level, go to npc.cfg i suppose and you’ll see like;

//----NpcID-----NpcName-------------------------combat--health npc = 0 Hans 0 0
The higher the combat, the more it hits, and health is just health.

Read full topic
